About
Hi! I’m Johsuan (Doreen) Huang, a finance and accounting professional with expertise in data analysis and visualization. I enjoy diving deep into datasets and extracting valuable insights through Power BI dashboards, R statistical analysis and Python programming.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me :)

- Experience -

Regional Key Account Intern | Shiseido APAC, Singapore | 2025
Financial Accountant | 10/10 Group, Taipei | 2022-2024
Senior Audit Associate | PwC, Taipei | 2020-2022



- Education -

Master of IT in Business (Data & Analytics) | Singapore Management University
Bachelor of Finance | National Chengchi University
